snippet: The United States, which won 109-83, will play Spain in the gold medal game Sunday, a rematch of the 2008 final in Beijing that the Americans won.
abstract: United States men's basketball team defeats Argentina, 109-83, and will play Spain in the gold medal final.
lead_paragraph: The United States, which won 109-83, will play Spain in the gold medal game Sunday, a rematch of the 2008 final in Beijing that the Americans won.

headline.seo: U.S. Superstar Relay Riddles Argentina in Basketball Semifinal
headline.main: U.S. Superstar Relay Riddles Argentina With Scoring Barrage
headline.print_headline: U.S. Superstar Relay Riddles Argentina With Scoring Barrage
